name: Joy Devnath
text: I am a passionate and data-driven Digital Marketing Expert with proven expertise in Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Social Media Marketing (SMM), and advanced Growth Hacking strategies. With years of hands-on experience in scaling businesses digitally, I help brands increase their visibility, engagement, and conversion rates across multiple channels.

name: RIMON DUTTA
text: Hi, I’m Rimon Dutta a passionate Full stack developer, mobile app developer, and SEO expert with a focus on performance, usability, and automation. I specialize in building high-quality web and mobile applications using modern JavaScript frameworks like React, React Native, and Three.js including advanced shaders, raymarching, and real-time rendering. Beyond development, I’m deeply involved in automation from workflow optimization with tools like n8n and Zapier, to custom-coded solutions that streamline repetitive tasks and boost productivity for teams and businesses.
